title: uLLam tuDikkudaDA
sahitya:
uLLam tuDikkudaDA paramA Unum urugudaDA


anupallavi

  kaLLattanamAi vanden kAdalaik-koLLai koNDu meLLa nazhuvalAmO vaLLal unakkazhagO


caraNam    kATruDan kanalinaik-kalakka viDukkirAi kattu kuyilukkum kaTruk-koDukkirAi
pOTriya jIvanai AtrilE viDuvAyO puruSan enrulaginArp-pughalap-paDuvAnE
